3: Tifa concentrated every ounce of the viral power inside her to shoot at her surroundings blindly.
Lucia, being in a frontal position—
A dark spike pierced through the ground where Lucia stood.
Lucia dodged the attack at the very last second.
At the very last moment, Lucia was clutched by someone and the two rolled into a nearby cover.
A dark spike pierced out of the ground where Lucia was just standing—
While Liv is in the back without any cover—
Lee took the blow for Liv. A dark spiked tentacle pierced through Lee's body.
Vital fluids dripped out of the wound—
Ignoring the pain with all his might, Lee clamped down on the tentacle with one hand, and pointed his gun toward Tifa's face with the other—
—and shot a bullet into her point-blank.
As the powers of Tifa faded, Lee was overtaken by fatigue and knelt on the floor.
The Corrupted around rushed forth in waves, but not at the Gray Ravens.
The Corrupted rushed toward the dying Tifa, surrounding her completely. They tore at and tried to steal pieces of her body.
They... to take Tifa's power... they're...
Liv... We don't need to see the rest of this...
Lee! Let me patch you up first—
Liv, we'll carry Lee and leave this place first! It's about to collapse here!
